title: Mini Chocolate Peppermint Cakes
ingredients: ['115g dark chocolate, broken up', '225g butter', '4 eggs', '400g caster sugar', '125g plain flour', 'For the mint layer', '360g icing sugar', '85g butter', '3 tablespoons milk', '2 teaspoons peppermint extract or flavouring', '3 drops green food colouring', 'For the topping', '80g dark chocolate, broken up', '3 tablespoons butter']
